title: Textile, "The Wedding", 1950
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: screen printed on plain weave
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 916.9 x 93.3 cm (30 ft. 1 in. x 36 3/4 in.)
creditline: Gift of Robert A. and Lynne C. Adams
description: A cartoon of a wedding scene, with the bride and groom at center, surrounded by family members, with children in the foreground. In black and multicolor on a light blue ground.
